trans-unit.source: Enables service debugging for a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] callback object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior"></xref> class.

The constructor creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior> object in which the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property is the value of `includeExceptionDetailInFaults`.
Controls whether a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] callback object includes managed exception information in the detail of the SOAP faults sent back to the service.
Gets or sets a value that controls whether client callback objects return managed exception information in SOAP faults back to the service.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] returns managed client callback exception information in the SOAP faults for service debugging purposes in duplex communication; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to support the behavior.
The endpoint to modify.
The objects that binding elements require to support the behavior.
Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to support the behavior.

Assigns the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
The endpoint that is to be customized.
The client runtime to be customized.
Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to support the behavior.
Throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException?displayProperty=fullName>; this behavior can only be used in a client application.
The endpoint that exposes the contract.
The endpoint dispatcher to be modified or extended.
Implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to support the behavior.
The endpoint to validate.
